name: Dukes of power
description:
In short

Grab a friend and carry them to your computer, then choose whether you would like to be a hero or a villain, and then force them to use the other controls! (On one keyboard sadly, because gamepads don't seem to work).  Before starting a round, choose how many lives each player starts with and on what map you would like to play. You can also disable or enable powerups. Choosing a character is also important, but if you can't decide, click the empty square to choose a random one.

--How to play--

-Controls

Player1:

-move: [A], [D], [Space]

-attack: [W,] [E], [F]

Player 2:

-move: [J], [L], [Alt]

-attack: [I], [O], [;]

-note:  you can't attack while moving.

-Winning

Get the health of your opponent to 0 before your life hits 0.

--The heroes--

- Captain Cool: Freeze your enemies in a block of ice, or throw a curving snowball

- professor King: Shrink to a tiny size and blast the villain with a deadly laser

- Liquorhide: Fly high and punch hard

- Blight skull: Teleport close and fire a projectile, if it hits fire again immediately, if not, wait a long while

--The villains--

- Redron: Summon a satellite strike, or shoot a quick laser blast

- Skull of iron: fire your shotguns with two bullets each, but hope they don't jam. Or throw a bomb and watch your enemy go boom

- Bread Man: Retreat into a hamburger cocoon and fly around the stage, eat a salami, or throw a salami. 

- Devlord: Summon Albert, he will serve you a weapon on a platter! Pick it up and use it
